meanings.definition: The belief that happiness and well-being are the highest goals in life.
meanings.sent1: In eudaimonisms, people strive for happiness above all else.
meanings.sent2: Her dedication to eudaimonisms led her to prioritize joy and contentment.
meanings.sent3: Even in a world of chaos, eudaimonisms reminds us to seek happiness.
meanings.sent4: Like a guiding light, eudaimonisms directs us towards a fulfilling life.
meanings.sent5: The essence of eudaimonisms is finding true happiness within oneself.

meanings.definition: The ethical theory that the highest good is the pursuit of personal happiness and well-being.
meanings.sent1: Eudaimonisms emphasizes the importance of personal well-being in ethical decisions.
meanings.sent2: Living by eudaimonisms means making choices that lead to personal happiness.
meanings.sent3: Even in tough times, eudaimonisms guides us to make ethical choices for our own happiness.
meanings.sent4: Just as a compass points north, eudaimonisms points us towards personal well-being.
meanings.sent5: The heart of eudaimonisms beats with the rhythm of personal happiness and fulfillment.
